author: Frances Yoon, Avantika Chilkoti
title: Global Stocks Fall After Trump Issues Warning on Pandemic - The Wall Street Journal
description: Global Stocks Fall After Trump Issues Warning on Pandemic The Wall Street Journal Dow Jones Futures: Stock Market Rally Stalls As US Coronavirus Cases Soar; Amazon, AMD, Nvidia, Microsoft Set Up Investor's Business Daily Dow sinks, virus pushes it to sharpest…
content:
Global stocks fell Wednesday after President Trump issued a stark new warning on the spread of the novel coronavirus in the U.S., reviving concerns about the potential damage to the worlds largest economy.
